oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kânûnnâme-yi cedide fî-mâ yete'allak bi'l-arâzî : manuscript, undated
Kânûnnâme-i cedide fî-mâ yete'allak bi'l-arâzî
Qānūn nāmah jadidah fī-mā yataʻallaqu bi-al-arāḍī
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: New land regulations and various taxes records.
Written in naskh, in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Catchwords embedded in text.
Glazed light-cream laid paper, boards covered with marbled paper, red leather spine.

With: Dürr-i meknûn (ff. 1v-28r) ; Din ve dünyaya nâfi yirmi üç hikmet (ff. 29v-32r) ; Vasiyet etmek hakkında risale (ff. 34r-37r) ; Ma'rūzāt (ff. 37v-50r) ; Fetvâlar (ff. 76v-89r) ; Kitāb Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ (ff. 98v-102v).
MS Turk 11. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Land tenure--Law and legislation--Turkey
Land use--Turkey
Land tenure (Islamic law)
